name: Balloon Party (LaserFocus)
description:
Please give some comments, feedback and suggestions after playing!
Feedback Form:
https://goo.gl/forms/fljRhgyT1HPMxGYV2

Balloon Party is a simple mini-arena-game where the player compete against AIs to score the highest in a match.

Player controls the blue character.

How to score:
- 15 points for bringing a single balloon back to the base (the square tile with the same color as the character).
- 40 points bonus for getting each color of balloons at least 1 (icons on the top-left of the screen).
- points will be reduced if hit by bomb or shock wave.

Tips:
- Power-Ups will be spawned randomly on the screen.
- Beware of falling bombs.

Controls:
- WASD or directional keys to move player.
- "Space" bar to dive forward.
- 'F' key to release balloons.
